BSF 2.4.0

October, 06, 2006 - BSF 2.4.0 Available

The release of BSF 2.4 from Apache Jakarta is now available for download. If you have any feedback on this release, feel free to join the discussion on the bsf-dev and bsf-user mailing lists.

Interested?

If you want to participate in developing BSF, join the bsf-dev mailing list and contribute your ideas.
